articles.author: Emily Mae  Czachor, Anna  Coren
articles.title: Bondi Beach shooting hero says he just wanted to stop the assailant from killing more innocent people - CBS News
articles.description: Ahmed al Ahmed, the man hailed as a hero for disarming one of the gunmen behind a deadly antisemitic attack on Australia's Bondi Beach, says he just wanted to save innocent people.
articles.content: Ahmed al Ahmed, the man hailed as a hero for tackling one of the gunmen behind an antisemitic attack on Australia's Bondi Beach earlier this month, is speaking out in the aftermath of the massacre. … [+1910 chars]
